-- | A streaming HTTP client
--   
@package list-t-http-client
@version 0.1.0.1

module ListT.HTTPClient
withResponse :: Request -> Manager -> (Response (ListT IO ByteString) -> IO a) -> IO a
bodyReader :: BodyReader -> ListT IO ByteString
